title: Jozi Gold
description: It is 2010, the year of the Soccer World Cup in South Africa. Like everyone else, Jeannie is caught up in the electric atmosphere. She has no idea that her sister's arrival from Australia is about to expose the fragility of her idyllic lifestyle.Capturing the energy and sensual verve of South Africa's most exciting city, this fast-paced novel brings together family values and romance, heartbreak and resolve. Ultimately inspiring, it is the story of a woman who refuses to be crushed and rises again from tragedy to reinvent her future with courage and hope.
author: Leanne Hunt
